attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do not allow bonuses to be paid to staff of Northern Rock or other tax payers banks to in the current economic climate. It does not give out the right signals to the general public, many of whom are losing their jobs.  Mr Brown take note.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
